name: Sparkk App
description: Discovery event platform helping people to connect through experiences.

team.name: Clément Frey
team.bioHtml: Founder Sparkk App • Worked at @InMobi, @Celtra

jobs.title: iOS Developer / CTO
jobs.description:
Working on a new social entertainment platform, I am looking for an iOS developer to join me on this exciting project and potentially become my co-founder.

Priority will be to finish developing the app (design is pretty much finalised and some code has been written) and work on the server side of things (ideally with python or ruby).

On the long term, I am looking for someone who can take ownership of the technical aspects of the business and drive things forward.
